library(animint2)

# Read data from meta.csv (replace with actual file if different)
gallery_data <- read.csv("meta.csv")

# Loop through each animint entry
for (i in 1:nrow(gallery_data)) {
  row <- gallery_data[i, ]
  
  # Access data from each row (replace with actual column names if different)
  animint_link <- row$link
  animint_title <- row$title
  screenshot <- row$screenshot
  
  # Create a card or tile for each animint
  # (Replace with your desired HTML structure for the card)
  cat("  * [", animint_title, "](", animint_link, ")", sep = "")
  if (nrow(gallery_data) != i) cat("<br>")  # Add line break except for last entry
}
